attributes.action: Legalize Cannabis For Medical And Recreational Use, Now We Are Leaving The EU
attributes.additional_details:
With the money lost from leaving the EU and the pound dropping to it's lowest point in 33 years, the only way we can bring the UKs economy back is by legalising Cannabis.

Who should control the production and supply of drugs : Governments or gangsters? That’s the choice that politicians face – there’s no third option in which drugs don’t exist. Unlike the UK, Canada has recognised this reality.

Polls show legalising cannabis is supported by 68% of the population.
attributes.background: Now we are leaving the EU Nigel Farage has confirmed that £350Million a week is not guaranteed to go to the NHS. The money earnt from taxing legalised cannabis can be used to make up the funds lost and be spent on the NHS.
